title: Courtyard of the Mosque of al-Maridani
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Collector's note: 17 Mardani (mosq.) Sahn pend. travaux. Mosque of el-Mâridâni. Translation of note: 17 Mârdâni mosque Sahn during construction.
location: Ad Darb al Aḩmar; Cairo; Egypt
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
